name: Short Sword
description: A short sword is a small, light, and versatile weapon. It is a favorite of rogues and bards.

name: Long Sword
description: A long sword is a versatile weapon. It is a favorite of fighters and paladins.

name: Great Sword
description: A great sword is a heavy weapon. It is a favorite of barbarians and fighters.

name: Dagger
description: A dagger is a small, light, and versatile weapon. It is a favorite of rogues and bards.

name: Short Bow
description: A short bow is a small, light, and versatile weapon. It is a favorite of rangers and rogues.

name: Long Bow
description: A long bow is a versatile weapon. It is a favorite of rangers and fighters.
